component.text: Verifying a IPv6 Default Route on R1

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands: Display the IPv6 OSPF routing table on R1 to view the default route propagated from R2.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Table - default - 9 entries
Codes: C - Connected, L - Local, S - Static,
U - Per-user Static route, B - BGP, R - RIP, H - NHRP,
I1 - ISIS L1, I2 - ISIS L2, IA - ISIS interarea,
IS - ISIS summary, D - EIGRP, EX - EIGRP external,
ND - ND Default, NDp - ND Prefix, DCE - Destination
NDr - Redirect, O - OSPF Intra, OI - OSPF Inter,
OE1 - OSPF ext 1, OE2 - OSPF ext 2,
ON1 - OSPF NSSA ext 1, ON2 - OSPF NSSA ext 2
OE2 ::/0 [110/1], tag 10
via FE80::2, Serial0/0/0
O 2001:DB8:CAFE:2::/64 [110/648]
via FE80::2, Serial0/0/0
O 2001:DB8:CAFE:3::/64 [110/648]
via FE80::2, Serial0/0/0
O 2001:DB8:CAFE:A002::/64 [110/1294]
via FE80::2, Serial0/0/0
R1#
command.instruction: You successfully verified the IPv6 default route was propagated to R1.
